timeline.bodyText: @yanghua @vinothchandar Some test classes do not have javadoc, while some others have. I think we'd better align on this just to standardize the codebase. If we agree that javadoc should be added to all test classes, then we'll fix them while making changes on those tests from now on.
timeline.author: xushiyan

replies.bodyText: I agree we'd better have javadocs.
replies.author: yanghua
